body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have Stillmoon Cavalier in play, and sufficient lands
2. Click Stillmoon Cavalier: choose Flying effect
3. Click Stillmoon Cavalier again What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: a choice between flying, first strike, and pump effects - just like on the first click.

Actual: +1/+0 pump is executed automatically; the game doesn't provide any way to gain first strike.

Similarly, if you choose first strike first, you can't then add flying. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.40 on Windows 7
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: Stillmoon Cavalier can't get both flying and first strike
content:
_From [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/) on August 15, 2013 12:27:28_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have Stillmoon Cavalier in play, and sufficient lands
2. Click Stillmoon Cavalier: choose Flying effect
3. Click Stillmoon Cavalier again What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: a choice between flying, first strike, and pump effects - just like on the first click.

Actual: +1/+0 pump is executed automatically; the game doesn't provide any way to gain first strike.

Similarly, if you choose first strike first, you can't then add flying. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.40 on Windows 7
